entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 25.
